remarks: Deduction form of ~ jao .  Disjunction of antecedents.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 3-Dec-2015.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
jaoded.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
jaoded.2 $e |- ( th -> ( ta -> ch ) ) $.
jaoded.3 $e |- ( et -> ( ps \/ ta ) ) $.
jaoded $p |- ( ( ph /\ th /\ et ) -> ch ) $.
